meanings.definition: The act of logging out of a computer system or online account.
meanings.sent1: After finishing her work, she clicked on logouts to exit the online account.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to always click on logouts before closing the computer to protect your information.
meanings.sent3: The logouts button became her best friend, ensuring her privacy and security.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, logouts act as the gatekeepers of personal data.
meanings.sent5: Remember, logouts are like the lock on the door of your online world.

meanings.definition: The process of ending a session on a computer or online platform.
meanings.sent1: His logouts were always swift and efficient, saving time for other tasks.
meanings.sent2: The logouts at the end of the day signaled the completion of work.
meanings.sent3: As the clock struck five, logouts marked the beginning of relaxation.
meanings.sent4: Logouts are the final curtain call of the digital performance.
meanings.sent5: With each logouts, a chapter closes in the digital story of the day.
